articles.author: Eric Mack
articles.title: Dragon Man skull dumbfounds, digs up doubts about human evolution - CNET
articles.description: The story of our species may run through a war-time construction project back to the wild and woolly steppes of Asia where Dragon people once roamed.
articles.content:
An illustration of Dragon Man at home.
Chuang Zhao
One of the key pieces to the puzzle of our long narrative arc as a human species may have been hiding at the bottom of a well in China for almost … [+4015 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Indonesia hits record of over 21000 daily Covid-19 virus infections; experts say yet to reach peak - The Star Online
articles.description: Indonesia set a new record for daily coronavirus cases on Sunday with more than 21,000, as hospitals are flooded with patients in Jakarta and other Covid-19 hotspots across Sout-East Asia's hardest-hit nation.
